text: @SadiqKhan So what will be gained even if the Government decide to publish the gory details? Just concentrate on doing your job properly for Londoners! Your time is running out! I have ordered TWO Million bottles of #Covidol - the herbal remedy for #coronavirus from #TanzaniaUnforgettable.
